content:
There are numerous must-see stops along the Hana Highway in Maui, Hawaii. Here are some of the top ones:

1. Twin Falls - a beautiful waterfall that you can hike to and even swim in.

2. Ho'okipa Beach Park - a popular spot for windsurfing and sea turtles.

3. Wai'anapanapa State Park - a stunning black sand beach with caves and natural lava rock formations.

4. Ke'anae Peninsula - a scenic drive with views of rugged coastline and taro fields.

5. Pua'a Ka'a Falls - a series of cascading waterfalls that you can get up close to.

6. Hana Bay - a pretty little bay with fishing boats and a black sand beach.

7. Seven Sacred Pools - a series of natural pools and waterfalls that are perfect for swimming.

8. Wailua Falls - a dramatic waterfall that you can see from the road.

9. Koki Beach - a picturesque red sand beach with great views of the coastline.

10. Haleakala National Park - where you can find the Pipiwai Trail and hike through a bamboo forest to see the towering Waimoku Falls.
